abstract: Xobni, the tool that makes Outlook e-mail a lot easier to use, now offers a paid version.
snippet: Xobni, the tool that makes Outlook e-mail a lot easier to use, now offers a paid version.
lead_paragraph: For all those Microsoft Outlook users who cannot imagine using their e-mail without the help of Xobni, the free software that makes Outlook e-mail much more bearable, a new version comes out Tuesday night that will super-charge the tool. The catch: you have to pay for it.
